text: Resurrection is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithRESURRECTIONResurrection and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Lawrence, and Marion Leonard. ==Actors== *Arthur V. Johnson - Prince Dmitri *Florence Lawrence - Katusha *Marion Leonard - A Prisoner *Owen Moore - At Court/At Prison *Mack Sennett - At Court/A Guard/At Inn *Clara T. Bracy ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Resurrection (1909 movie)
